International festival to improve public knowledge and understanding pof science and technologies. More than 400 delegates from all over Europe, science teachers, science communicators, publishers, top scientists and high-level representatives of the ministries and European organisations are meeting at CERN to brainstorm future solutions to bolster physics\' popularity. The programme also includes spectacular demonstrations of new educational tools.

Festival international pour am\xc3\xa9liorer la connaissance et la compr\xc3\xa9hension de la science et des technologies par le public. Plus de 400 d\xc3\xa9l\xc3\xa9gu\xc3\xa9s venus de toute l\'Europe, professeurs de sciences, communicateurs scientifiques, \xc3\xa9diteurs, scientifiques de haut niveau et repr\xc3\xa9sentants de minist\xc3\xa8res et d\'organisations europ\xc3\xa9ennes se r\xc3\xa9unissent au CERN pour r\xc3\xa9fl\xc3\xa9chir \xc3\xa0 des solutions d\'avenir pour renforcer la popularit\xc3\xa9 de la physique. Le programme comprend \xc3\xa9galement des d\xc3\xa9monstrations spectaculaires de nouveaux outils p\xc3\xa9dagogiques.

Sur un feuillet manuscrit ins\xc3\xa9r\xc3\xa9 dans la jaquette: "D\xc3\xa9tail de l\'U5 en b\xc3\xa9tonnage \xc3\xa9tancheit\xc3\xa9. B\xc3\xa9tonnage radier UX. U5 - Etancheit\xc3\xa9 pos\xc3\xa9e, coffrage. U5 B\xc3\xa9tonn\xc3\xa9. Un cot\xc3\xa9 tunnel b\xc3\xa9tonn\xc3\xa9, l\'autre RA avec coffrage. 137 - UX24 dans le PX coffrage montant. 162 - Vue du bas du PX vers le haut la nuit. On coule le b\xc3\xa9ton. 175 - A bord du coffrage, \xc3\xa9tancheit\xc3\xa9, b\xc3\xa9tonnage. On coule le b\xc3\xa9ton et on vibre. 244 - Dans le bureau EUROLEP, r\xc3\xa9union de chantier. 397 - Echafaudage UX24. 418 - Pose \xc3\xa9tancheit\xc3\xa9 \xc3\xa0 bord d\'une nacelle. 449 - UX Belle vue depuis le haut. 454 - Dans l\'U5, on part sur l\'UW et on monte vers le haut du PM. 472 - Tunnel b\xc3\xa9tonn\xc3\xa9, vue \xc3\xa0 terre. Il y a encore le rail. 480 - Vue du coffrage roulant \xc3\xa0 terre. 503 Depuis le haut PX24, on descend au fond o\xc3\xb9 il y a le coffrage montant." In 1963 a Working Party of ECFA, comprising nine people, was set up under the chairmanship of Eduardo Amaldi. In its report the group recommended the construction of both the ISR and the 300 GeV proton synchrotron. In December 1965 the CERN Council approved the ISR project and continued study of the 300 GeV project (which was finally approved, as the SPS (Super Proton Synchrotron) in 1971). The ISR was inaugurated on 16 October 1971 and closed on 26 June 1984.

Deep Convolutional Networks for Event Reconstruction and Particle Tagging on NOvA and DUNE
The video was digitized from its original recording as part of the CERN Digital Memory project

<!--HTML-->Deep Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) have been widely applied in computer vision to solve complex problems in image recognition and analysis. In recent years many efforts have emerged to extend the use of this technology to HEP applications, including the Convolutional Visual Network (CVN), our implementation for identification of neutrino events. In this presentation I will describe the core concepts of CNNs, the details of our particular implementation in the Caffe framework and our application to identify NOvA events. NOvA is a long baseline neutrino experiment whose main goal is the measurement of neutrino oscillations. This relies on the accurate identification and reconstruction of the neutrino flavor in the interactions we observe. In 2016 the NOvA experiment released results for the observation of oscillations in the \xce\xbd \xce\xbc \xe2\x86\x92 \xce\xbd e channel, the first HEP result employing CNNs. I will also discuss our approach at event identification on NOvA as well as recent developments in the application of CNNs for particle tagging at NOvA, event identification at DUNE and other ongoing work.
